price: (99) And [then] he said, "Indeed, I will go to [where I am ordered by] my Lord; He will guide me.
arabic: وَقَالَ إِنِّي ذَاهِبٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّي سَيَهۡدِينِ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: waqāla innī dhāhibun ilā rabbī sayahdīni
